p: EV71 (strain XF; Microorganisms & Viruses Culture Collection Center (MVCCC)) was obtained from the MVCCC, Wuhan Institute of Virology (WIV), Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS). Viruses were amplified and titrated by 50% tissue culture infectious dose (TCID 50) in Vero cells using the Reedâ€“Muench formula ( 44).
